title: What are the best new games for Xbox One? - Quora

response.answer_text: Sekiro: Shadows Die Twice, Fromsoftware’s new suicide-simulator, taking place in a mythical japanese world.  Borderlands 3. If you like looter-shooters, this is an absolute must-play from Gearbox.  Hellblade: Senua’s Sacrifice. A truly dark adventure into the dark side of the human psyche, with action and puzzle elements.  Red Dead Redemption 2. A big western sandbox game from Rockstar, if you’re into sim elements, western themes and stories at all, pick this up.  Plague Tale: Innocence. An action-survivor adventure from Asobo studios, taking place in old England, with a truly dark tone. These are the relatively new games that came to mind, I don’t think you could go wrong with these.

upvoters.user_id: Jack Davies（デイビースジャック）

response.answer_text: The best new game for Xbox One is: Borderlands 3 - A quirky and graphic shooter that has the characters from the older video games. The graphics are a big improvement over the sequel which was released years ago. Gameplay acts the same, and there are a ton of guns and loot to collect and fight with.
